AND MON LIKE '%'|| #{mon}||'%'
AND TUE LIKE '%'|| #{tue} ||'%'
AND WED LIKE '%'|| #{wed} ||'%'
AND THUR LIKE '%'|| #{thur} ||'%'
AND FRI LIKE '%'|| #{fri} ||'%'
AND ID = #{id}
